name: explosion

effect_entries.effect: Halves the target's Defense for damage calculation, which is similar to doubling the attack's power.

effect: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses.  Inflicts regular damage.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Inflicts severe damage but
makes the user faint.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Inflicts severe damage but
makes the user faint.
flavor_text_entries.gold-silver:
Very powerful but
makes user faint.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Very powerful but
makes user faint.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user explodes
to inflict terrible
damage even while
fainting itself.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user explodes to
inflict damage on all
Pokémon in battle.
The user faints upon
using this move.

The user explodes to
inflict damage on all

The user faints upon
using this move.

The user explodes to
inflict damage on all

The user faints upon

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user explodes to inflict damage on
those around it.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user attacks everything around it
by causing a tremendous explosion.
